meanings.definition: A coil of wire wound on a core used to introduce inductance into an electric circuit.
meanings.sent1: The inductors in the circuit helped control the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The technician carefully placed the inductors in the device to improve its performance.
meanings.sent3: The inductors in the circuit whispered secrets to each other about the electricity passing through.
meanings.sent4: Like guardians of the circuit, the inductors protected the flow of energy.
meanings.sent5: The inductors hummed softly as they worked their magic in the electronic system.
